name: LIVER AND GALL BLADDER
V: Dry, rough, scanty secretions, irregular activity
P: Soft, excessive bile production, gall stones, inflammation, abscesses, increased activity
K: Enlarged, heavy, firm, scanty bile, decreased activity
desc: Most pain in the liver and gall bladder area is due to high Pitta. Kapha causes heaviness and stagnation in the area. Vata causes dryness and atrophy.
